reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
SETUP
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Simple EXIF/IPTC Mappings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Simple EXIF/IPTC Mappings dialog'.
Select the 'Title' option from the 'Alt Text' drop down list.
Select the 'Title' option from the 'Title Text' drop down list.
Select the 'Caption' option from the 'Caption' drop down list.
Select the 'Copyright' option from the 'Copyright' drop down list.
Select the 'Credit' option from the 'Credit' drop down list.
Select the 'Keywords' option from the 'Keywords' drop down list.
Select the 'none' option from the 'Media categories' drop down list.
Select the 'none' option from the 'Media Tags' drop down list.
Select the 'Source' option from the 'Source' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
STEP 2
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Media Gallery' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Enter '2d6137455f4c48a' in the 'Title' text box.
STEP 3
Click the 'Media Items Select' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Click the 'Add files' link.
Click the 'All Files' icon.
Click the local 'Pictures' icon.
Click the test picture link.
Click the 'Open' button.
Click the 'Start upload' link.
Wait for file upload to reach 100%
Click the 'Next' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Click the 'Add' button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Click the 'Add files' link.
Click the 'All Files' icon.
Click the local 'Pictures' icon.
Click the test picture link.
Click the 'Open' button.
Click the 'Start upload' link.
Wait for file upload to reach 100%
Click the 'Next' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Verify the img source of the Media Item contains 'NUP_155306_0046'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Verify the img source of the Media Item contains 'NUP_155306_0046'.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
STEP 4
Click the 'Edit' button with index '1'.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'Episodic'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '1' value matches 'Brownie Harris/NBC'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '1' value matches '2013 NBCUniversal Media, LLC'.
Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306, Revolution, Episode 118, Season 1'.
Click the 'Close Window' image.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
STEP 5
Click the 'Edit All' button.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306_0046.JPG'.
Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'Episodic'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '1' value matches 'Brownie Harris/NBC'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '1' value matches '2013 NBCUniversal Media, LLC'.
Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '1' value matches 'NUP_155306, Revolution, Episode 118, Season 1'.
STEP 6
Enter '3d36b394b35e49b' in the 'Title Text' text box with index '1'.
Enter '6568e1758ed44dc' in the 'Alt Text' text box with index '1'.
Enter '2427dfc1d18d455' in the 'Source' text box with index '1'.
Enter '8a6b3e2241d54ae' in the 'Credit' text box with index '1'.
Enter 'c90b2cc5ad93490' in the 'Copyright' text box with index '1'.
Enter 'c9966f709534457' in the 'Keywords' text box with index '1'.
Enter '5becefba46ca446' in the 'Title Text' text box with index '2'.
Enter '2bf4fc689847446' in the 'Alt Text' text box with index '2'.
Enter 'f0072cce04be418' in the 'Source' text box with index '2'.
Enter 'c9b61f66f0404ab' in the 'Credit' text box with index '2'.
Enter '097c2af6178e4ed' in the 'Copyright' text box with index '2'.
Enter '0d717a8c62574ed' in the 'Keywords' text box with index '2'.
Click the 'Save' button with index '2'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
STEP 7
Click the 'Edit All' button.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches '3d36b394b35e49b'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches '6568e1758ed44dc'.
Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches '2427dfc1d18d455'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '1' value matches '8a6b3e2241d54ae'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '1' value matches 'c90b2cc5ad93490'.
Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '1' value matches 'c9966f709534457'.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '2' value matches '5becefba46ca446'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '2' value matches '2bf4fc689847446'.
Assert that the Source box with index '2' value matches 'f0072cce04be418'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '2' value matches 'c9b61f66f0404ab'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '2' value matches '097c2af6178e4ed'.
Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '2' value matches '0d717a8c62574ed'.
Click the 'Close Window' image.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Media Gallery 2d6137455f4c48a has been created.' is present.
STEP 8
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Media Gallery' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
Enter 'bbbfc7ab3a6641d' in the 'Title' text box.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
STEP 9
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
STEP 10
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'IPTCDefault' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches 'drpin075402'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches 'drpin075402'.
Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'David Riecks Photography'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '1' value matches '?1985 David Riecks: www.riecks.c'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '1' value matches '?1985 David Riecks, All Rights Reserved'.

Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '1' value matches 'environment, ecology, ecosystem, environmentalism, scenery, nature, land, mountains, mount, Himalayans, sky, skies, cloud, clouds, concepts, concept, conceptual, summit, peak, weather, snow, snowing, snowfall, outdoors, outdoor, outside'.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Media Gallery dialog'.
STEP 11
Click the 'Edit' button.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches 'drpin075402'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches 'drpin075402'.
Assert that the Source box with index '1' value matches 'David Riecks Photography'.
Assert that the Credit Text box with index '1' value matches '?1985 David Riecks: www.riecks.c'.
Assert that the Copyright Text box with index '1' value matches '?1985 David Riecks, All Rights Reserved'.

Assert that the Keywords Text box with index '1' value matches 'environment, ecology, ecosystem, environmentalism, scenery, nature, land, mountains, mount, Himalayans, sky, skies, cloud, clouds, concepts, concept, conceptual, summit, peak, weather, snow, snowing, snowfall, outdoors, outdoor, outside'.
STEP 12
Enter '6b41f104805343c' in the 'Title Text' text box with index '1'.
Enter '2f196644aba7400' in the 'Alt Text' text box with index '1'.
Enter '99db5bf91845436' in the 'Source' text box with index '1'.

Enter 'f124c3c49f31464' in the 'Copyright' text box with index '1'.
Enter '2462027e8fd543e' in the 'Keywords' text box with index '1'.
Click the 'Save' button with index '2'.

Click the 'Edit' button.
Assert that the Title Text box with index '1' value matches '6b41f104805343c'.
Assert that the Alt Text box with index '1' value matches '2f196644aba7400'.
